title: KIM SWITCH / DEAD HUSBAND
description: After you have failed the redcheck when telling WCW about her dead husband.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So, the death notification..." the..."
dialogueTree.text: "So, the death notification..." the lieutenant says as soon as you've left the apartment.

links.title: Empathy: "He's avoiding your gaze. This is th..."
links.text: He's avoiding your gaze. This is the time to say how sorry you are about how things went.

links.title: You: ""That did not go...""
links.text: "That did not go..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Well*? No, it didn't.""
links.text: "*Well*? No, it didn't."

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry, I know I fucked up.""
links.text: "I'm sorry, I know I fucked up."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's alright, don't worry about it..."
links.text: "It's alright, don't worry about it." His eyes wander over the sleeping district.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll call the station tomorrow and..."
links.text: "I'll call the station tomorrow and let them know the name of the deceased."

links.title: You: ""That's it?""
links.text: "That's it?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's it. We should get back to o..."
links.text: "That's it. We should get back to our case. There's nothing more we can do here."

links.title: You: ""What about Billie and her kids?""
links.text: "What about Billie and her kids?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""There's not much we can do for the..."
links.text: "There's not much we can do for them anymore, I'm afraid."

links.title: Volition: "They have to. It's not your place t..."
links.text: They have to. It's not your place to live their lives.

links.title: You: ""Right, lets try to get back to it..."
links.text: "Right, lets try to get back to it then." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He looks at you. "And... officer --..."
links.text: He looks at you. "And... officer -- I've seen worse. This wasn't the worst I've seen, okay? Now, let's go."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "I really have, he thinks. She was s..."
links.text: I really have, he thinks. She was strong. She made it easy for us.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's alright, don't worry about it..."
links.text: "It's alright, don't worry about it." His eyes wander over the streets.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll call the station when we're f..."
links.text: "I'll call the station when we're finished with the day and let them know the name of the deceased."

links.title: You: ""There's nothing to discuss, let's..."
links.text: "There's nothing to discuss, let's move on." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, I'll call the station when w..."
links.text: "Well, I'll call the station when we're done with the day and inform them about the identity of the deceased."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But yes, that's on me. Let's get o..."
links.text: "But yes, that's on me. Let's get on with the murder investigation."

links.title: Shivers: "You look south, over the crumbling..."
links.text: You look south, over the crumbling balustrade. There -- 1.2 kilometres away -- a piece of broken stone cuts into the sky. A tomb. On it, a mural that used to say: tomorrow is just a whisper away. You cannot *really* see the Feld building from here, but somehow you feel like you should return to it.
